column2:
Enjoy Air Hockey like never before!!!

Brand new Glow Hockey game is ready to catch your attention. 
Play against bot and challenge yourself with Global Leaderboard.
You can also play with your friends on the same device.

FEATURES:
+ Super accurate Physics game
+ Simple and smooth controls.
+ Easy, Normal, hard and Insane Difficulty modes.
+ Table, Neon, Doodle, Soccer, Frozen and Pool modes.
+ 2 Players on the same devices.
+ HD quality graphics.
+ Tablet support.
+ Hours of FUN FOR FREE!

New update coming soon!

Turn your iPhone or iPod into a wireless Joystick ,fully functional mouse,keyboard,play the game "Need For Speed" .

Tested:
Need for speed 6
Need for speed 9
Need for speed 12

Not just a remote mouse,more function coming,
 This app(new version) is able to control the car\helicopter models after you connect the transmitter to the audio jack of iPod touch or iPhone. 

Features:
- Accelerometer based mouse controller
- Trackpad(full screen vertical and landscape modes)
- Ability to hide keyboard (shake to hide/show)
- Landscape keyboard (shake in landscape mode to show)
- Presentation mode with Pro option (Keynote/Powerpoint)
- Numeric keyboard
- Application notifications
- Remote keyboard with function and arrow keys
- Scroll pad
- Left and Right mouse buttons
- Modifier Keys
- On screen typing
- Custom sensitivity settings
- Supports Bonjour or static IP
- No screen size limitation. Works with multiple monitors.
- High resolution graphics for retina display on iPhone 4.
- And much, much more.

Requirements:
- Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7 (32/64bit)
- WIFI router (works best on a local area network or Ad hoc network)
- Server Software

** BEFORE YOU RUN THE SOFTWARE ** you will need to download the server application from :

http://www.microkernel.cn

** IMPORTANT ** IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS AT ALL, PLEASE CHECK THE TROUBLESHOOTING SECTION ON OUR SITE, THEN USE THE CONTACT FORM ON OUR SITE IF YOU ARE STILL HAVING PROBLEMS. We can not respond to reviews, so posting your questions there will not get you an answer. None of the reviewers saying that our app doesn't work ever contacted us for help. If you are unable to get the app to connect, contact us and WE WILL GET IT WORKING FOR YOU.

Visit our site for video and setup instructions.

column1: Ice Hockey HD - Air Hockey Neon Perfect Light Animation
column2:
The new sports game Hockey with Neon Air Hockey HD version to bring you relaxing time really amazing.
Enjoy all of your favorite moments of the playoffs with the No.1 exciting and fast paced table sports game, Ice Hockey HD!
Designed to deliver the amazing graphic quality of glow display, see and feel the real air hockey experience. With 4 levels of difficulty the computer can be a good match for anyone, from new comer to hockey expert! You can also play against a friend on the same device.

column1: Glow Hockey HD - 2 Player Neon Light Air Hockey
column2:
Air Glow Hockey is a free air hockey game, you can play fun hockey games with your firends.  This is the best thriller for hockey and glow sport lovers.
You can play easy and hard modes. The opponentâ€™s artificial intelligence is not easy at all.
Air Glow Hockey - 2 multi-player air hockey game for people of all ages. The game offers 3 difficulty levels.
In single Player mode the aim of the game is to play against the computer and beat it by scoring 7 goals first. Whereas the 2 player mode allows players on the either side of the mobile device to play against each other and the player who scores 7 goals first is declared the winner.

Features:
- Single player or multiple player mode.
- 3 difficulty Levels.
- Bright physics collision
- Advanced AI robot
- Original soundtrack and sound effect
